devdoc.author: Yoni Svechinsky

getReturn(address,address,uint256).details: Returns the min return on conversion of token

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

tradeExactly(address,uint256,address,uin.details: Trades from src to dest returning sending at most maxDestAmount to recepient and returnin the rest to the sender

params.maxDestAmount: Maximum amount of dest tokens to convert to
params.recepient: Address to send dest tokens to

tradeExactly(address,uint256,address,uin.return: A tuple of the converted amount and remainder;Worst rate converted amount

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: A mock margin exchange for local testing purposes

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
